author: The Editorial Board
title: The Bernanke Correction
text:
The stock market continued its wild swings Friday, finishing up for the day but still concluding the worst week in nearly a decade. Look for more such gyrations as investors adapt to the return of market-based interest rates.
In his typical way, Donald Trump lumbered into part of the truth this week with a tweet. “In the ‘old days,’ when good news was reported, the Stock Market would go up,” he wrote. “Today, when good news is reported, the Stock Market goes down. Big mistake, and we have so much good (great) news about the...
